channel.title: backports on The Art of PostgreSQL
channel.description: Recent content in backports on The Art of PostgreSQL

item.title: prefix 1.0.0
item.description: So there it is, at long last, the final 1.0.0 release of prefix! It’s on its way into the debian repository (targetting sid, in testing in 10 days) and available on pgfoundry to. In order to make it clear that I intend to maintain this version, the number has 3 digits rather than 2… which is also what PostgreSQL users will expect. The only last minute change is that you can now use the first version of the two following rather than the second one:
